name: pokemon
description: A guessing game where you identify Pokémon silhouettes.
rules: You will be shown a silhouette of a Pokémon.
Type the name of the Pokémon to guess

name: Cookie Clicker Clone
description: Accumulate points by clicking as fast as you can!
rules: Click on the cookie to earn points.
Unlock upgrades with your points to earn more per click.
Compete with friends for the highest score.
